channel.title: Comments for page "Sealed Kunai"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sealed Kunai"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Legacy is good ONLY from appetite and stam bonuses. Leg-jutsu are really seems like casting with stupid "leg seals" O_O, not usual good "hand" variant xD

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
You have no clue just how useful this is when doing PW missions before you can do them legitimately (have finished all content Root and prior), or even then if you're not max level and/or just don't want to risk the mission. It's like a use of old Greass without the auto-get mechanics. Yes, it's not -optimal- but Legacy gets so much else that's quite Awesome, having an undeniably useful jutsu that once you're powerful enough means you don't use it as much doesn't mean it's crap.

As for getting the eye-related Awesoem abilities, they've always been a waste really. Note that McM has once stated that he's going to eventually remove those abilities.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Even if u would get this jutsu before jounin it is more useless when ninja became more powerfull. It helped me a lot only when I started PW at low season by 45-47 kunai got 50 needed for quest missions.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Seems kind of a waste of Awesome, then, to be honest.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: …Maybe to keep it balanced with actual Legacy-nin…?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: so you can't actually USE it until you hit jonin? whats the point?!

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: You definitely get a Kunai every dayroll, though it doesn't start showing up until Jonin+, just like actual legacy-nin.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Nope. You could stack 'em if they were, shove 'em off to other accounts, then get a bunch of 'em. One per legacy account, per day.

item.title: Tradeable?
item.content:encoded: I'm pretty sure they're not but I'm just asking to be sure

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: sine i use this almost exclusively, the moment i can afford this, i'm going to nab that awesome kunai…..

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Well, there's a big difference between having the jutsu in your list, and being able to use it! It would be like knowing the Turn the Page jutsu, and not having any note pages to use it.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: more or less—the jutsu becomes available for your use, so it probably doesnt matter if you have it or no.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I hope so, cause otherwise the awesome ability is rather useless…

item.title: Do you get this...
item.content:encoded: Do you get this item if you get the jutsu for it with awesome points?
